skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. The first hit has a 50% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns. The second hit has a 50% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn.

skills.desc:
[Passive Effect]

Whenever an ally is attacked while under a [Block Damage] buff placed by this Champion, has a 75% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff on the attacker for 1 turn.

[Active Effect]

If an ally is about to get killed by a fatal hit, blocks incoming damage and places a [Block Damage] buff on them for 1 turn.
skills.name: Brass Clad [P]
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
